abstract: Obama administration lifts ban on security assistance to Bahrain that was imposed after nation's crackdown on demonstrators in 2011; move will allow United States to provide equipment to Bahrain's military and national guard.
lead_paragraph: The ban on security assistance to Bahrain was imposed after the nation’s crackdown on demonstrators in 2011.

headline.main: U.S. Lifts Ban on Bahrain Aid
headline.print_headline: U.S. Lifts Ban on Bahrain Aid

snippet: The ban on security assistance to Bahrain was imposed after the nation’s crackdown on demonstrators in 2011.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
